div.p: Specifies the state change of a target Act, such as a document or an entry, from its previous state as a predecessor Act. For example, if the target Act is the result of a predecessor Act being "obsoleted" and replaced with the target Act, the source ProvenanceEventCurrentState Act code would be "obsoleted".
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ProvenanceEventCurrentState-AS
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ProvenanceEventCurrentState-DC

description.value: Specifies the state change of a target Act, such as a document or an entry, from its previous state as a predecessor Act. For example, if the target Act is the result of a predecessor Act being "obsoleted" and replaced with the target Act, the source ProvenanceEventCurrentState Act code would be "obsoleted".
